title: Give & take = Give and take
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Consumers
description: Consumer and Corporate Affairs Canada is a federal government agency concerned with protecting the interests of the consumer in today's complex and highly competitive marketplace. Whatever is sold commercially --eggs, home furnishings, construction helmets, heating and cooking fuels -- comes under its scrutiny. This film describes the whole range of checks and investigations carried out by the Department.
